description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. After an alleged attack by the Chepakwik Indians, the people of Bronco County are on the brink of war. Only a farm boy who knows the truth can stop it. Together with his three friends - a gunslinging desperado, an Indian princess, and a rodeo gal - he must expose a conspiracy by bringing the notorious Saints-Little gang to justice.
description.short: After an alleged attack by the Chepakwik Indians, the people of Bronco County are on the brink of war. Only a farm boy who knows the truth can stop it. Together with his three friends - a gunslinging desperado, an Indian princess, and a rodeo gal - he must expose a conspiracy by bringing the notorious Saints-Little gang to justice.
